You probably heard about me because I am the founder of the Twisted python networking engine open source project. I also post a lot about politics; I’d personally prefer to be apolitical but unfortunately the global rising tide of revanchist fascism is kind of dangerous to ignore.

a students account, TU Berlin based. We are not a part of the academic system, we work in other sectors like public transport. Aswell Aramis-Ultras.

We love systems theory.

Sociology is soothing.

Deeply in love with the internet. Working for Wikimedia Deutschland as team lead
Communitys & Engagement. Mostly here as my private self.

Doing Product Management at #Hetzner Cloud. This is my personal account, opinions are my own.

Previously leading and supporting engineering teams at #EnterpriseDB, #Percona and #SUSE. Working #remote from #Hamburg since 2002.

I've been working in the #Linux and #opensource infrastructure field since 1995. #EV and #ebike driver interested in #RenewableEnergy, #Mobility and concerned about #ClimateChange

I post in English and German. Posts get deleted automatically after 30 days.
